meanings.definition: To make a podcast available for download or streaming.
meanings.sent1: I podcasted my latest episode for everyone to listen to.
meanings.sent2: She podcasted the interview with a famous author on her website.
meanings.sent3: The cat podcasted its meows all night long, keeping the neighbors awake.
meanings.sent4: The sun podcasted its warm rays across the field, creating a peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The teacher podcasted the lesson so students could review it later.

meanings.definition: The act of creating or producing a podcast.
meanings.sent1: After the podcasted, they shared it on social media.
meanings.sent2: The podcasted was a huge success, gaining thousands of listeners.
meanings.sent3: The podcasted walked into the studio with a microphone in hand, ready to record.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a podcasted, full of ideas waiting to be shared with the world.
meanings.sent5: The podcasted was a source of inspiration for many aspiring creators.
